Definition: VIDIS MedicationSchema Data Model
Unique identifier(s) for the schema - can be several, in different unique name spaces

Short: Last time the document was updated
Definition: Last time the document was updated

Short: Identifier or reference to the patient
Definition: Identifier or reference to the patient. Should be an NISS or BIS number

Short: Label or title of the document
Definition: Label or title of the document
Unique identifier of the person who is responsible for the information content. Should be an NISS or BIS number
date/time when entered
Type of schema
A line of medication
Condition(s): ele-1:All FHIR elements must have a @value or children {hasValue() or (children().count() > id.count())}

Definition: Unique identifier of the person who is responsible for the information content. Should be an NISS or BIS number
date/time when entered

Short: A unique identifier of the line
Definition: A unique identifier of the line, including the namespace

Short: Unique version identifier for the schema
Definition: Unique version identifier for the schema

Short: The status of the medication treatment entry - active, stopped, entered in error, etc.
Definition: The status of the medication treatment entry - active, stopped, entered in error, etc.

Short: The business state of the treatment - active, stopped, etc.
Definition: The business state of the treatment - active, stopped, etc.

Short: Reason for the medication being in the status
Definition: Reason for the medication being in the status - e.g. why not taken, why suspended...

Short: Where the treatment originated - hospital, ambulatory,...
Definition: Where the treatment originated - hospital, ambulatory,...
The medicinal product
